alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:31PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Madison and central Gallatin Counties through 500 PM MDT... At 430 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles west of Crescent Lake, or 29 miles north of West Yellowstone, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ennis, Jeffers and Big Sky. This includes the following highways... Highway 191 between mile markers 31 and 57, and between mile markers 59 and 62. Highway 287 between mile markers 39 and 53. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for south central Montana.
